text: Jason Adam Griffith (born November 29, 1980) is an American voice actor and actor. He has worked on several animated TV series. He was the voices of Sega mascot Sonic the Hedgehog, Shadow the Hedgehog and Jet the Hawk in the Sonic the Hedgehog video game series. He was also the voice of Cilan, Ash's former traveling partner and first Gym Leader in Pokémon: Black & White. ==Filmography== ===Film=== Year Title Role Notes 1998 Edge of Seventeen Scott Uncredited 2005 Pokémon: Lucario and the Mystery of Mew Sir Aaron 2007 Am I Evil Greg 2008 Kill Kill Faster Faster Cassius Uncredited 2008 The Machine Girl Ryota Additional voices Live action dub 2008 Sonic: Night of the Werehog Sonic the Hedgehog (Sonic the Werehog) Short 2009 ManDate Chris Short 2009 Pokémon: Arceus and the Jewel of Life Marcus 2010 Animals United The Chimpanzee 'Toto' 2011 Pokémon the Movie: Black—Victini and Reshiram and White—Victini and Zekrom Cilan 2011 The Painting Additional voices 2012 Pokémon the Movie: Kyurem vs. the Sword of Justice Cilan 2012/2015 009 Re:Cyborg 009/Joe Shimamura English dubbed 2013 Pokémon: Meloetta's Moonlight Serenade Scraggy Short 2013 Pokémon the Movie: Genesect and the Legend Awakened Cilan ===Television=== Year Title Role Notes 2001-2013 Pokémon Cilan Servine Brawly Looker Additional voices 2003-2006 Sonic X Sonic the Hedgehog/Super Sonic/Dark Sonic Shadow the Hedgehog/Super Shadow Christopher Thorndyke (originally) Credited as J.
